title: NewsBreak: Pelosi Will Announce Formal Impeachment Inquiry – Report
text:
NewsBreak: Pelosi Will Announce Formal Impeachment Inquiry – Report

Sports & General 9 hours ago (Sep 24, 2019 03:12PM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com – House Speaker Nancy Pesoli (D-Calif.) will announce a formal impeachment inquiry of President Donald Trump later Tuesday, The Washington Post reported. The move will come amid published reports of Trump pressuring Ukraine to investigate former Vice President Joe Biden, who is seeking the Democratic nomination for president. Stocks initially fell on the report but recovered slightly. A “growing number of House Democrats are backing an impeachment inquiry,” the Post reported. Trump earlier said he would release an unclassified and unredacted transcript of his call with Ukraine’s leader.

NewsBreak: Pelosi Will Announce Formal Impeachment Inquiry – Report
description: NewsBreak: Pelosi Will Announce Formal Impeachment Inquiry – Report
